message: This offer leaves a larger share for me, but still gives you a significant amount. Consider accepting, as the value will decrease for both of us in further rounds.

This offer is more fair than the previous one, as it gives you a larger share while still leaving me a substantial amount. Consider accepting this offer as the value of the money will continue to decrease in the next round.
I understand you want a fairer share, Bob. This offer is a compromise, slightly favoring me but still a good deal for you before inflation eats further into our potential gains.
